name: Dragon Quest X: All In One Package - Versions 1-5
summary: A new all-in-one package featuring Dragon Quest X Version 1 to 5. The package includes Dragon Quest X: Mezameshi Itsutsu no Shuzoku Online, Dragon Quest X: Nemureru Yuusha to Michibiki no Meiyuu Online, Dragon Quest X: Inishie no Ryuu no Denshou Online, Dragon Quest X: 5,000-Nen no Tabiji Harukanaru Kyuuri he Online, and the latest additional package Dragon Quest X: Ibara no Miko to Horobi no Kami Online.
